name: The 3rd Int’l Conference on Hydrology and Water Management
content: The 3rd Int’l Conference on Hydrology and Water Management (CHWM 2024) will be held during April 19-21, 2024 in Xiamen, China. This Conference will cover issues on Hydrology and Water Management, and other related topics. It dedicates to creating a stage for exchanging the latest research results and sharing the advanced research methods in related fields.
